Notes:
Due to some enterprises' statistical system upgrades, the cumulative figures for "Mobile Phone Call Duration" and "Mobile Internet Access Traffic" have been slightly adjusted.

Due to the adjustment of SMS statistics caliber by individual enterprises, from July to December 2018, the absolute numbers for "Volume of Mobile SMS Business" are vacant, and the year-on-year growth rate is based on the data of other enterprises that have not adjusted the statistical caliber.
Data Source: National Bureau of Statistics
